title: $:/plugins/benwebber/expand
name: expand
description: Expand upon terms without breaking the flow of text
author: Ben Webber
text:
{"tiddlers":{"$:/plugins/benwebber/expand/README":{"title":"$:/plugins/benwebber/expand/README","text":"''expand'' lets you define terms in text without breaking the flow.

<$list filter="[variables[]match[twdoc.list-macros]]" emptyMessage="Install [ext[twdoc|https://benwebber.github.io/tiddlywiki-plugins/#twdoc]] to view documentation.">
<<twdoc.list-macros "[all[shadows]tag[$:/tags/Macro]prefix[$:/plugins/benwebber/expand/]]">>
</$list>
"},"$:/plugins/benwebber/expand/styles":{"text":".tw-m-0{margin:0}.tw-cursor-pointer{cursor:pointer}.tw-border-none{border-style:none}.tw-bg-transparent{background-color:initial}.tw-p-0{padding:0}.tw-underline{text-decoration-line:underline}.tw-decoration-dotted{text-decoration-style:dotted}.hover\:tw-decoration-solid:hover{text-decoration-style:solid}","title":"$:/plugins/benwebber/expand/styles","type":"text/css","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet"},"$:/plugins/benwebber/expand/macros/private":{"title":"$:/plugins/benwebber/expand/macros/private","text":"\define expand.toggle()
<$list filter="[<stateTiddler>is[tiddler]]">
  <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<<stateTiddler>> />
</$list>
<$list filter="[<stateTiddler>!is[tiddler]]">
  <$action-createtiddler $basetitle=<<stateTiddler>> text="true" />
</$list>
\end
"},"$:/plugins/benwebber/expand/macros/public/dd":{"title":"$:/plugins/benwebber/expand/macros/public/dd","tags":"$:/tags/Macro","twdoc.description":"Define a term. The revealed text has the CSS class `expand-dd`.","twdoc.param.term":"The term to define, as specified in <<twdoc.macro expand.dt>>.","twdoc.param.text":"The definition text.","twdoc.param.class":"Class to add to the revealed text.","twdoc.param.class.optional":"true","text":"\define expand.dd(term, text, class)
\whitespace trim
\import [[$:/plugins/benwebber/expand/macros/private]]
<$vars stateTiddler=<<qualify "$:/state/plugins/benwebber/expand/$term$">>>
  <!-- HACK: Preserve leading space (e.g., before a new sentence). -->
  <$set name=space filter="[<__text__>prefix[ ]] +[then[ ]else[]]" select=0>
    <$reveal type="nomatch" state=<<stateTiddler>> text="" class={{{ [<__class__>] expand-dt +[!is[blank]join[ ]] }}}>
      <<space>><<__text__>>
    </$reveal>
  </$set>
</$vars>
\end
"},"$:/plugins/benwebber/expand/macros/public/dt":{"title":"$:/plugins/benwebber/expand/macros/public/dt","tags":"$:/tags/Macro","twdoc.description":"Introduce a term to expand later. This creates a button that the reader can click to expand the related term. The button has the CSS class `expand-dt`.","twdoc.param.term":"The term to define. If you specify <<twdoc.param text>>, this can be a convenient identifier instead.","twdoc.param.text":"Text to display instead of the term.","twdoc.param.text.optional":"true","twdoc.param.class":"Class to add to the term button.","twdoc.param.class.optional":"true","text":"\define expand.dt(term, text, class)
\whitespace trim
\import [[$:/plugins/benwebber/expand/macros/private]]
<$vars stateTiddler=<<qualify "$:/state/plugins/benwebber/expand/$term$">>>
  <$set name=text filter="[<__text__>is[blank]] +[then<__term__>else<__text__>]" select=0>
    <$button class={{{ [<__class__>] expand-dd tw-bg-transparent tw-border-none tw-cursor-pointer tw-decoration-dotted tw-m-0 tw-p-0 tw-underline hover:tw-decoration-solid +[!is[blank]join[ ]] }}} actions=<<expand.toggle>>>
      <<text>>
    </$button>
  </$set>
</$vars>
\end
"}}}
